## Conda environment

{{< fa paperclip >}} [conda.yaml](share/conda.yaml)

A [`conda`][conda home] environment was used with this project. [Download](share/conda.yaml) the environment file and use a command similar to the following to reinstall all of the packages.

[conda home]: https://docs.conda.io/en/latest/

```{bash write-conda-recipe}
#| cache: false
#| include: false

mkdir --parents share \
&& conda env export \
| grep --invert '^prefix: ' \
> share/conda.yaml
```

```{bash show-example-conda-create}
#| cache: false
#| eval: false
#| code-fold: false
#| filename: Create a conda environment from an environment file

conda create --name environment --file share/conda.yaml
```
